message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $95.
